name: rasterProfile
description: Returns spectral profile values from a raster layer

arguments.description: name or id of raster layer
geometry to select profiles for. Supported geometries: point, polygon (centroid)
output format of spectral profile: 'text', 'json', 'map' or 'bytes'

examples.returns: Returns the spectral profile for the current (centroid) point coordinate from 'myrasterlayer'
Returns the spectral profile as JSON text string
